lead_paragraph: Brendan Shanahan went online to try the NHL draft lottery simulator just once, and was excited to see the Toronto Maple Leafs win the first pick.

headline.print_headline: Last-Place Leafs Win NHL Draft Lottery; Jets Jump to 2nd
headline.main: Last-Place Leafs Win NHL Draft Lottery; Jets Jump to 2nd
